test.description: This test displays 100 users from the Catalog.

statements.text: SELECT DISTINCT US.USER FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSCOLAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE ='' UNION SELECT DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSDBAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE ='' UNION SELECT DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSPACKAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE ='' UNION SELECT DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSPLANAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE ='' UNION SELECT DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSRESAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE ='' UNION SELECT DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSROUTINEAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE ='' UNION SELECT DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSSCHEMAAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = ' ' UNION SELECT DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSSEQUENCEAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE = ' ' UNION SELECT DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSTABAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE ='' UNION SELECT  DISTINCT GRANTEE AS USER FROM SYSIBM.SYSUSERAUTH WHERE GRANTEETYPE ='' ) US FETCH FIRST 100 ROWS ONLY
